trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> objects.
A <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> object contains a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> objects.
Each <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> object represents a single entry in the `<connectionStrings>` configuration-file section.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection"></xref> class.
Adds a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object to the collection.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object to add to the collection.
Removes all the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> objects from the collection.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection.Clear%2A> method removes all the connection strings from the configuration file at the current configuration hierarchy level and writes a `<clear>` tag in the file.
The `<clear>` tag signifies that all the connection strings defined in the parent configuration files are disregarded by the system.
Returns the collection index of the passed <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object in the collection.
The collection index of the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the connection string at the specified index in the collection.
In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> class.
The index of a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object in the collection.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object at the specified index.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object with the specified name in the collection.
In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> class.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object with the specified name; otherwise, `null`.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object from the collection.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object in the collection.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object from the collection.
The name of a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object in the collection.
Removes the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object at the specified index in the collection.
The index of a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object in the collection.
